ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] ...but it's still easier than playing a rogue
ygData.msgSnippet: No they gave the magic hth attack to us bards as well.  I was too high to make use of it at the time, but it should be handy for those who want to do wisps
ygData.messageBody:
No they gave the magic hth attack to us bards as well. I was too high to
make use of it at the time, but it should be handy for those who want to do
wisps early since mesh gloves are very cheap.

Kitasi



Err, you're talking like mesh gloves right? I thought only monks could use
those as magic attacks and that for the rest of us they were just a light
weight glove. Am I wrong?

Peace,
Evulia, who gave her mesh gloves to her monk not too long ago...
